Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>...<MYNAME>! C'mon, get your bum
up already!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
It's about time you woke up, sleepy-head!
<PAGE>
Hmph! Mr. Sun is already up and shining, so
you're already behind!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
There's, um...there's something...IN my lake.
<PAGE>
Now, i-it's not like I'm scared or somethin'! I'm
no fraidy-cat! My magic can take care of
anything!
<PAGE>
B-but, um, if you went and checked it out first,
you'd save me the trouble of having to cast any
spells, see?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Anyway, come with me! Hurry!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great! I knew you would, <MYNAME>! Hang on,
I'll fly us right there with my magic.
<PAGE>
Ala-ka-WHOOSH!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
H-here. This is where I saw IT...I think. Y-you go
on ahead!

Look! Intruders! Get 'em, everybody!
<PAGE>
Yeeeaaah!!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wha? Wh-who are all of you?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
No, who are YOU?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm <BLUE>Witchie</BLUE>, the most ultimate-est magician in
the whole world!

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Wowzers...so there's someone from the Witches'
Circle here, huh?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Now you know who I am, so it's your turn to
talk! Who ARE all of you?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're Nature Sprites. We serve Dessie.
<PAGE>
I'm <BLUE>Flik</BLUE>, the leader of this merry band. My
specialty is making sure everything's clean.

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Awww...Fliiiiik, I'm hungry. Oh wait, is it my
turn? I'm <BLUE>Mora</BLUE>, and I'm good at makin'
everybody feel better.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lovely ol' place here. Real nice, from top to
bottom. I'm <BLUE>Pepita</BLUE>, and my cookin' is the best of
the best!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! Name's <BLUE>Gusto</BLUE>! I scrub Dessie's laundry with
a prize-fighter's passion! Nice to meet'cha!

<FACE_TORCU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You may call me <BLUE>Torque</BLUE>. I serve
as Dessie's tutor and educator.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wait...Dessie? Are you talkin' about the
GODDESS? Like, my Auntie's super #1 arch-
nemesis?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Noooot exactly. She IS a goddess, but at the
same time, she's kind of not. She's...little. That's
why she's just Dessie.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wait, is there even a distinction?

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yep! Dessie just became a full-fledged goddess
not long ago.
<PAGE>
This is her very first job, so she just moved here.

<FACE_TORCU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As this is her very first posting, the five of us
have been assigned to her as her helpers and
assistants.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We scoped out this here area and liked its
quaint, rural feel, so we decided we'd up an'
settle in.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
But...but this is MY home! You can't just live
here without my permission!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Huh? So you're sayin' that there's not just an
empty house?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
That's MY house!

<FACE_MORA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? Whoops... Dessie already moved in.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Unbelievable! No supernatural moocher is gonna
set foot in MY house. I'm gonna toss her out!

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, would you please look in on things
for us?
<PAGE>
The five of us still have several things to
investigate around here.

<FACE_PES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We'd really appreciate it. Thanks!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! We were so lucky to have found such a
wonderful house here with no one living in it.
Ooh, and there are cute froggies here too!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Eep! Wh-who's there?!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
So, you're Dessie, huh? Well, I'm Witchie, and
this is MY house you're in!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You mean this house wasn't abandoned?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
No! This is MY house! MINE, MINE, MINE!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh my goodness! I'm so sorry. We didn't know.
<PAGE>
It was just so cute and wonderful, and it looked
like no one was home, so it seemed like a great
place to live.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Cute...?
<PAGE>
I made this house with my own magic, y'know.
Isn't it the cutest, bestest house you've ever
seen?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What?! You built this adorable house with your
own magic, Witchie?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Wooow! That's so amazing! I can't imagine
casting such a complicated spell!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
W-well, for a goddess, you seem to have
unusually good taste. Yes, my magic really is
that awesomely amazing!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're incredible, Witchie! I really have toooons
of respect for you!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
O-ho ho ho ho!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well then, I suppose we ought to leave you be,
then. I need to find a home of my own...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
W-wait a minute.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have anywhere to go, right? I can't let
you live inside my house, but you can stay in
the lake out front if you want.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really! The great Witchie never lies!
<PAGE>
You're a goddess, so you can live in places like
springs and stuff, right?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yep! I'd really like that, if it's okay with you,
Witchie.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmph. Well, I suppoooose. But you'd better be
thankful!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am. Thank you very much.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Witchie? There's something I'd like to ask you...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it? I'm in a good mood, so I guess I
might as well hear you out.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm new here, so I don't know anyone yet. W-will
you please be my first friend?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welllll...okay. But I'm the boss and you're my
lackey! Got it?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of course. Thank you so much!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, this is Dessie. As of today, she'll be
living in my lake.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm pleased to meet you. Oh, Witchie, is this a
human?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh-huh! And another one of my lackeys, too.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. If you can see me, that means you're a
pretty special human.
<PAGE>
That reminds me! <MYNAME>, I'll be living here
in Witchie's lake...
<PAGE>
So I'd be ever so grateful if you stopped by
occasionally to throw an offering into the lake
for me. ♪
<PAGE>
If you give me lots of great offerings, I might be
able to do something really neat for you
someday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But please don't throw any trash into the lake.
Littering makes me cry.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There! Looks like we're all done here. I'll send
you back to your house, now.
<PAGE>
Ala-ka-ZAAAP!
